channel.title: Throne of Lies Log Templater
channel.description:
I've written an application to make log management much easier.
Fully approved to use by Imperium42.
It allows you to create an unlimited number of log templates to use, without the need to manage multiple text files and the hassle of copying and pasting every game.
Simple to use and with full unicode support. Although only supports Windows 8/10.
I do have a working Windows 7 version, so if you need it, let me know.
To get it, go here: https://github.com/Katuva/tol_log_templater click on releases and download the latest Release-x.x.zip or the installer.exe
If you have any issues, let me know and feel free to aid with development.
EDIT: Updated to include a unicode character picker.
Changelog:
0.5.2 - Add in checks to stop certain errors. 0.5.1 - Fix a bug when finding the game window. 0.5 - Added unicode character picker. 0.4 - Added ability to edit existing templates. 0.3 - Initial public release.

There no .exe and when i try to open one of the “App” its open a IE page…

Read full topic

item.title: Throne of Lies Log Templater
item.dc:creator: Erekel
item.description:
You can click on “More info” and then run anyway.

It is warning you because the executable isn’t signed and is unknown (as I made it).

It is perfectly safe to run, its been scanned by totalvirus and a link is on the github page, or if you’d prefer, you can compile from source yourself.

Read full topic

item.title: Throne of Lies Log Templater
item.dc:creator: Erekel
item.description:
I’ve written an application to make log management much easier.

Fully approved to use by Imperium42.

It allows you to create an unlimited number of log templates to use, without the need to manage multiple text files and the hassle of copying and pasting every game.

Simple to use and with full unicode support. Although only supports Windows 8/10.

I do have a working Windows 7 version, so if you need it, let me know.

To get it, go here: https://github.com/Katuva/tol_log_templater click on releases and download the latest Release-x.x.zip or the installer.exe

If you have any issues, let me know and feel free to aid with development.

EDIT: Updated to include a unicode character picker.

Changelog:

0.5.2 - Add in checks to stop certain errors.
0.5.1 - Fix a bug when finding the game window.
0.5 - Added unicode character picker.
0.4 - Added ability to edit existing templates.
0.3 - Initial public release.
